title: Stream: Gold Panda – Trust EP
content:
Constantly reinventing the sound that he helped to pioneer, UK producer Gold Panda has just dropped his newest release, the Trust EP.

Featuring the self-titled single, it’s choppy, atmospheric and far more diverse than his debut LP, not to mention leagues ahead of the vast majority of his contemporaries. Check out Trust EP in full below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
